li.label: terrible ceremonial suicide
li.description: That ceremonial suicide was terrible. The blade was thrust laterally and there was blood and entrails everywhere. Disgusting!

li.label: boring ceremonial suicide
li.description: That ceremonial suicide was not good. The speech seemed forced. At the very least we have restored the honor of our colony.

li.label: honorable ceremonial suicide
li.description: A honorable ceremonial suicide. The shadow of defeat no longer clouds our minds.

li.label: unforgettable ceremonial suicide
li.description: That ceremonial suicide was unforgettable! Everyone will remember the courage, self-control, and strong resolve. The honor of our colony is now spotless.
